summary:
Warmer Torch Lighting.

Does what it says. Makes the lighting cast from torches warmer instead of cold white.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/32269-1-1361653025.jpg[/img]

Does what it says, makes the lighting cast from torches a bit warmer instead of cold white.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Download with Manager.
2) Activate Mod.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Additional info:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Depending on your ENB settings it could be either too orange or still white. So you might have to play around with the settings.

In the end i created this file for my own use but thought id share it.

========================================================================================

Your character looks really nice! Can u upload a save?

Yes, but i wont because shes part of the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21184/?][b]Children of Skyrim[/b][/url] Mod. (Look for Anja)
author: Lunyra

files.name: Warmer Torch Lighting
files.changelogHtml:
Corrected ESP name.
Added 50% and 100% increased radius.
